message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the use of ad-hoc retrieval models for recommendation tasks, which falls under the information retrieval (IR) field. Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses machine learning techniques such as learning to rank and neural models, which are commonly used in the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper deals with music recommendation, which could fall under the sub-category of cybernetics (cs.CY) or social and information networks (cs.SI).
